text: The building housing the institute The Salomon Ludwig Steinheim Institute of German-Jewish Studies is a research institute of the University of Duisburg- Essen whose research focuses on the cultural and religious history as well as the history of literature and events of the Jewish community in German- speaking areas. The institute has made contributions in teaching in the field of Jewish Studies at the University of Duisburg-Essen.
